# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Electricity generation structure at position(x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)
Consists of following entities
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has fuel before starting the mining operation.
### Errors when using stone furnaces
- Ensure that the stone furnace has the required ingredients before starting the smelting operation.
### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump is placed in a valid position and has enough resources to operate.
### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel before starting the operation.
### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a valid power source before starting the operation.
### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that the pipe group is properly connected to the boiler and steam engine before starting the operation.
### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure that the electricity group is properly plugged into the electric network before starting the operation.
### Errors when using belt groups
- Ensure that the belt group is properly connected to the transport belts before starting the operation.

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned by the agent.
